Class WebcamSarxosServiceImpl

    @Component
public class WebcamSarxosServiceImpl
extends MosipWebcamServiceImpl
    class to access the webcam and its functionalities.

    Himaja Dhanyamraju

      • captureImage

        public BufferedImage captureImage()
        Description copied from interface: IMosipWebcamService
        This method captures the image from webcam and return it. Will return image object or null if webcam is closed or has been already disposed by JVM.
        Specified by:
        captureImage in interface IMosipWebcamService
        Specified by:
        captureImage in class MosipWebcamServiceImpl
        Returns:
        BufferedImage returns the image object that is captured from the webcam.
